info.default: We have received your order. Please check your order for payment status.
info.atm: Your order has been received, please make payment within time
info.cvs: Your order has been received, please make payment at the Super Business Opportunity Desk within time

error.0: There are some problems in the information, please check whether the order was successfully established
error.1: You can also click to copy the error message and provide the information to the customer service to handle it for you
